spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches (Living/Dining left, Kitchen top-center, Utility top-right, Toilet mid-right, Bedroom bottom-right, Balcony bottom-left). However, the right-side service/shaft zone is modeled differently than the plan (partitioning and widths don’t align), several window spans (especially along the bottom/bedroom side and balcony glazing) appear longer/different than indicated, and balcony depth/room proportions read enlarged in the 3D compared to the stated 7'10" x 3'5" balcony and 10'0" x 16'7" living proportions. Some door swing/orientation details (notably the toilet entry) are not clearly consistent with the 2D swing depiction.

structural_fidelity.notes: Primary adjacencies are correct (Kitchen-Utility, Toilet near Bedroom, Balcony off Living). Wall thickness is generally consistent and doors are embedded plausibly. Main penalty is for the altered/misrepresented right-side shaft/closet/duct area (extra/shifted partitions vs the single marked shaft/void in plan), which introduces potential hallucinated subspaces and changes to wall alignment in that zone. No major room is missing.

furniture_mapping.notes: Key furniture types match (sofa + coffee table + dining table in Living/Dining; bed in Bedroom; kitchen counters/appliances). Minor mismatches in exact placement/scale (e.g., sofa/table spacing and the bedroom furniture clearances) relative to the tighter 2D proportions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good isometric camera and clean presentation. Lighting is consistent and geometry is mostly clean with readable spaces. Slight penalties for mild proportional exaggeration (balcony/glazing spans) and minor clarity issues where doors/walls overlap in the service/toilet zone.

detected_errors.description: Balcony and adjacent Living/Dining proportions appear exaggerated in 3D (balcony depth and glazing span read larger than the 2D dimensioned intent).
Right-side service/shaft/duct region is spatially mis-modeled: partitions and widths do not align with the single marked shaft/void area shown to the right of the toilet in the 2D plan.
Possible hallucinated additional sub-compartment/partitioning along the far-right exterior beyond what is explicitly defined in the 2D plan (extra segmented service space).
Window placements/spans differ: bedroom-side and balcony-facing glazing lengths appear longer or redistributed compared to the 2D openings.
Toilet door swing/orientation is not clearly consistent with the 2D plan’s door swing depiction (appears rotated/treated differently in 3D).
